text: Mr. Toilet: The World's #2 Man is a 2019 documentary film about Singaporean activist Jack Sim, who uses humour to publicize the issue of improving bathroom sanitation."Hot Docs film 'Mr. Toilet' shows Jack Sim's struggle to improve global sanitation". CTV News, April 26, 2019. It had its world premiere at the Hot Docs Canadian International Documentary Festival on 27 April 2019, where it was named the winner of the Scotiabank Docs For Schools Student Choice Award."‘We Will Stand Up,’ ‘Hope Frozen’ Take Top Prizes at Hot Docs". Variety, May 4, 2019. Shown on Al Jazeera (English) T.V. channel, November 16, 2019. ==Cast== * Jack Sim ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2019 films Category:American films Category:American documentary films
title: Mr. Toilet
